description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Chicago 2016
http://gotochgo.com

Full talk title: "Building Low Latency Microservices & Monoliths in Java Using High Performance Serialization & Messaging"

Peter Lawrey - CEO at Higher Frequency Trading Ltd & Author of Vanilla Java Blog

ABSTRACT
- when to use micro-services architecture vs monoliths.
- why latency matters more for micro-services and what can you do about it.
- low latency/low GC serialization and [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:

title: GOTO 2016 • Building Low Latency Microservices & Monoliths in Java • Peter Lawrey
